void add(int x, int y) {
    int u = get_id(x, y);
    int q, w, e, r;
    int minq = 1e9, minw = 1e9, mine = 1e9, minr = 1e9;
    for (int i = x; i <= n; ++ i) {
        //q:ä¸‹é¢çš„
        
        if (a[i][y] == '#') {
            q = get_id(i - 1, y);
            minq = min(minq, i - x);
            // G[u].push_back(make_pair(get_id(i - 1, y), 1));
            break;
        }
    }
    for (int i = x; i >= 1; -- i) {
        //w:ä¸Šé¢çš„å¢™
        if (a[i][y] == '#') {
            minw = min(minw, x - i);
            w = get_id(i + 1, y);
            break;
        }
    }
    for (int i = y; i <= m; ++ i) {
        //e:å³é¢çš„å¢™
        if (a[x][i] == '#') {
            mine = min(mine, i - y);
            e = get_id(x, i - 1);
            break;
        }
    }
    for (int i = y; i >= 1; -- i) {
        //r:å·¦é¢çš„å¢™
        if (a[x][i] == '#') {
            minr = min(minr, y - i);
            r = get_id(x, i + 1);
            break;
        }
    }
    int Min = 1e9 + 10;
    Min = min(Min, minq);
    Min = min(Min, minw);
    Min = min(Min, mine);
    Min = min(Min, minr);
    G[u].push_back(make_pair(q, Min));
    G[u].push_back(make_pair(w, Min));
    G[u].push_back(make_pair(e, Min));
    G[u].push_back(make_pair(r, Min));
}

void ADD(int x, int y) {
    int u = get_id(x, y);
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++ i) {
        int xx = x + dx[i];
        int yy = y + dy[i];
        if (xx > n || xx < 1 || yy > m || yy < 1) continue;
        if (a[xx][yy] == '#') continue;
        G[u].push_back(make_pair(get_id(xx, yy), 1));
    }
}

void bfs(int s) {
    queue <Node> q;
    memset(dis, 0x3f3f3f3f, sizeof dis);
    q.push((Node){s, st[s]});
    dis[st[s]][s] = 0;
    while (q.size()) {
        int u = q.front().id;
        int state = q.front().sta;
        q.pop();
        for (int i = head[u];i;i = e[i].nxt) {
            int v = e[i].to;
            if (((state & e[i].state) == e[i].state) && dis[state | st[v]][v] == INF) {
                dis[state | st[v]][v] = dis[state][u] + 1;
                q.push((Node){v, state | st[v]});
            }
        }
    }
}

void build() {
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += k) {
        if (i + k - 1 > n) break;
        pre[i] = s[i] % p;
        for (int j = i + 1; j <= i + k - 1; ++ j) {
            pre[j] = (1ll * pre[j - 1] * s[j]) % p;
        }
        suf[i + k - 1] = s[i + k - 1] % p;
        for (int j = i + k - 2; j >= i; -- j) {
            suf[j] = (1ll * suf[j + 1] * s[j]) % p;
        }
    }
    
    int pos = (n / k) * k + 1;
    pre[pos] = s[pos] % p;
    for (int i = pos + 1; i <= n; ++ i) {
        pre[i] = (1ll * pre[i - 1] * s[i]) % p;    
    }
    suf[n] = s[n] % p;
    for (int i = n - 1; i >= pos; -- i) {
        suf[i] = (1ll * suf[i + 1] * s[i]) % p;
    }
}

void decantor(int n, int k) {
    -- k;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i) {
        int cnt = k / fac[n - i];
        for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++ j) {
            if (!vis[j]) {
                if (!cnt) {
                    a[i] = j;
                    vis[j] = true;
                    break;
                }
                cnt --;
            }
        }
        k %= fac[n - i];
    }
}

void bfs(int s) {
    queue <int> q;
    q.push(s);
    inq[s] = true;
    while(q.size()) {
        int u = q.front();
        q.pop();
        inq[u] = false;
        for (int i = head[u];i;i = e[i].nxt) {
            int v = e[i].to;
            int w = e[i].val;
            if (v == fa[u]) continue;
            f[v] = f[u] - (w - a[u]) * siz[v];
            f[v] += (w - a[v]) * (n - siz[v]);
            // printf("u:%d v:%d ",u,v);
            // printf("a[v]:%d a[u]:%d\n",a[v], a[u]);
            // cout << f[v] << ' ' << u << ' ' << v << endl;
            if (!inq[v]) inq[v] = true, q.push(v);
        }
    }
}
